𒆉 𒅘 immen;immen₂ thirst ᵗimmen צימאון tsimaon 𒌓 ጥም ṭəm 𒌓 ʕaṭaš צָמָא‎ tsamá ظَمَأ‎ ẓamaʔ #şamû;şūmu

𒆉𒁇 zabar₃ •copper bronze 𒌓𒊕𒁇 zabar "(to be) bright, pure; arrowhead; weapon; metal mirror; (to be) shiny; measuring vessel made of bronze; a metal bowl; bronze" #ebbu ; hutpu ; kakku ; mušālu ; namru ; qû ; sappu ; siparru
